action-logs.contentMarkdown:
**Timeline Interface with Clean Aesthetics**

Streamlined event display:
- Headers: Consistent gray backgrounds with accent icons
- Tabs: Clean white-on-gray tab system
- Log entries: Light gray backgrounds with proper spacing
- Typography: Clear hierarchy with readable font weights
- Interactive elements: Subtle hover states and transitions

alert-settings-btn.contentMarkdown:
**Settings Access**
Open alert configuration with outline styling and settings icon

back-btn.contentMarkdown:
**Click Navigation**
When clicked, navigates back to the position management page from the event detail page

back-to-positions-btn.contentMarkdown:
**Click Navigation**
When clicked, navigates back to the position management page from the position detail page

dashboard-header.contentMarkdown:
**Modern Glass Header with Backdrop Effects**
- Glass morphism background with backdrop blur
- Gradient title with clip-path text styling
- Icon integration with gradient backgrounds
- Floating card design with shadow effects
- Interactive buttons with hover states

dashboard-root.contentMarkdown:
**Notion-inspired Dashboard Design**

Clean and modern interface with Notion-like aesthetics:
- Background: Simple gray-50 background (#f9fafb)
- Typography: Clean, readable fonts with proper hierarchy
- Color palette: Primary grays with strategic accent colors (blue, green, orange, purple)
- Border radius: Consistent rounded corners (lg = 8px for cards)
- Shadows: Subtle shadow-sm for depth
- Spacing: Generous padding and margins for breathing room

**Report Generation**
Generate comprehensive daily report with gradient button styling and download icon

When clicked, navigates to the position management page showing detailed view of all LP positions with filtering and management capabilities

position-management.contentMarkdown:
**Clean Table Interface**

Notions database-inspired design:
- Headers: Light gray backgrounds with clean typography
- Rows: Minimal styling with subtle hover effects
- Status indicators: Color-coded dots (green/orange/red)
- Badges: Properly colored status badges with semantic colors
- Actions: Blue primary buttons with clear hierarchy
- Filters: Clean badge-style filters with proper states

position-management-page.contentMarkdown:
**Position Management Page**

- Page Header
    - Back to Dashboard Button
    - Page Title
    - Page Subtitle
    - Bulk Actions Button
    - New Position Button
- Filters Section
    - Search Input
    - Filter Dropdown
    - Results Count
- Position Tabs
    - All Tab
    - Active Tab  
    - Paused Tab
- Position Cards List
    - Position Info
        - Performance Icon
        - Position Name
        - Status Badge
        - AI Optimization Badge
    - Action Buttons
        - Analytics Button
        - Settings Button
        - More Button
        - Pause/Resume Button
    - Metrics Grid
        - CPL Metric
        - CVR Metric
        - Sessions Metric
        - Conversions Metric
        - Spend Metric
        - Update Metric
    - Keywords Section
- Empty State

quick-stats.contentMarkdown:
**Notion-style Statistics Cards**

Minimal yet informative design approach:
- Background: Clean white with subtle gray borders
- Layout: Compact padding (p-5) with proper text hierarchy
- Icons: Colorful icon containers (green, blue, orange, gray) in rounded backgrounds
- Typography: Semibold numbers (text-2xl) with medium labels
- Hover states: Subtle shadow transitions
- Color coding: Strategic use of accent colors for trends and status

summary-stats.contentMarkdown:
**Clean Statistics Sidebar**

Notions-inspired compact information display:
- Event breakdown: Colored indicators (red, yellow, blue, gray) with proper semantic meaning
- Alert cards: Color-coded urgency levels (red for critical, orange for warnings)
- Action buttons: Primary blue buttons for consistency with overall design
- Typography: Balanced text hierarchy with appropriate font weights
- Layout: Efficient vertical spacing for optimal readability
